tuv.seg: Overview Document Payments to families and children Gives a short description of the social welfare benefits available to families and children
Overview Document Na híocaíochtaí do theaghlaigh agus leanaí Tá cur síos anseo ar na sochair leasa shóisialaigh ata ar fáil do theaghlaigh agus leanaí
Family Income Supplement is a weekly tax free payment to people on low pay. You must have at least one child to qualify
Le go bhféadfá é a fháil is cuma pósta nó gan a bheith pósta tú ach caithfidh duine clainne amháin ar a laghad a bheith agat
Maternity Benefit is a payment by the Department of Social Protection to women on maternity leave from work
Is íocaíocht í Sochar Máithreachais a dhéanann an Roinn Coimirce Sóisialaí le mná atá ar shaoire mháithreachais ón obair
Find out more about Maternity Benefit and how to apply
Faigh tuilleadh eolais faoi Shochar Máithreachais agus conas iarratas a dhéanamh
Paternity Benefit is a new payment that will be made to a person who is on paternity leave from work and covered by social insurance (PRSI)
Paternity Benefit is a new payment that will be made to a person who is on paternity leave from work and covered by social insurance (PRSI)
It is available for any child born or adopted on or after 1 September 2016
It is available for any child born or adopted on or after 1 September 2016
Child Benefit is a payment to the parents or guardians of children under 16 years of age, or under 18 years of age if the child is in full-time education or has a disability

Is íocaíocht Stáit é Sochar Linbh a íoctar le tuismitheoirí nó le caomhnóirí leanaí atá faoi 16 bliana d'aois, nó faoi 18 bliana d'aois má bhíonn an leanbh in oideachas lánaimseartha nó má tá an leanbh faoi mhíchumas
One-Parent Family Payment is a payment for men and women who are bringing children up without the support of a partner
Is íocaíocht d'fhir agus do mhná a bhíonn ag tógáil clainne gan tacaíocht óna pháirtí atá i gceist leis an Íocaíocht Teaghlaigh Aontuismitheora
Adoptive Benefit is a payment made to people on adoptive leave from work
Déanann an doiciméad seo cur síos ar an íocaíocht sochar uchtaíoch a íoctar le daoine a chomhlíonann critéir áirithe
Find out how to apply and rates of benefit
Míníonn sé chomh maith conas a ríomhtar an ráta íocaíochta
Health and Safety Benefit
Sochar Sábháilteachta agus Sláinte
A summary of Health and Safety Benefit for pregnant/breastfeeding women
Achoimre ar Shochar Sábháilteachta agus Sláinte do mhná in Éirinn atá ag iompar/ag tabhairt bainne cíche dá leanaí
Pregnancy and social welfare payments
Toircheas agus íocaíochtaí leasa shóisialaigh
Pregnancy may affect your social welfare payment
D'fhéadfadh tionchar a bheith ag toircheas ar d'íocaíocht leasa shóisialaigh
You may be entitled to a different payment or an increase in your current payment
D'fhéadfá a bheith i dteideal íocaíocht dhifriúil a fháil nó méadú a fháil id' íocaíocht reatha
Find out more here
Faigh tuilleadh eolais anseo
Back to School Clothing and Footwear Allowance
Liúntas Éadaí agus Coisbhirt chun Filleadh ar Scoil
The Back to School Clothing and Footwear Allowance is paid each year to families on certain social welfare and other benefits
Íoctar an Liúntas Éadaí agus Coisbhirt chun Filleadh ar Scoil gach bliain le teaghlaigh atá ar íocaíochtaí áirithe leasa shóisialaigh agus sochair
The scheme helps families with the cost of sending children back to school.The scheme opens on 1 June 2016
Cabhraíonn an scéim leo leis an gcostas a bhaineann le páistí a chur ar ais chuig an scoil
Deserted Wife’s Benefit is a social insurance payment made to a women who was deserted by her husband
Is íocaíocht árachais shóisialaigh é an Sochar Banchéile Thréigthe a íoctar le bean ar thréig a fear céile í
This payment was closed off to new applicants in January 1997
Cuireadh deireadh leis an dá íocaíocht d' iarratasóirí nua i mí Eanáir 1997
Some women however continue to get a deserted wife's payment
Faigheann roinnt ban, áfach, íocaíocht banchéile thréigthe go fóill
Back to Work Family Dividend
Aistriú ó Íocaíocht Teaghlach Aontuismitheora
Information on the new Back to Work Family Dividend
Tugtar cuntas sa cháipéis seo ar do chuid roghanna
This payment gives extra support to lone parent and long-term jobseeker families with children who find or return to work from January 2015
Seol d’iarratas ar an Díbhinn Teaghlaigh um Fhilleadh ar Obair chuig d’ionad Intreo nó d’oifig áitiúil leasa shóisialaigh

Deserted Wife’s Allowance is a means-tested payment for women under 66 without dependent children who were deserted by their husband and who do not qualify for Deserted Wife’s Benefit. Transition from One-Parent Family Payment
Deserted Wife’s Allowance is a means-tested payment for women under 66 without dependent children who were deserted by their husband and who do not qualify for Deserted Wife’s Benefit
Most Read in "Social Welfare"
Ábhar is mó éilimh i "Leas Sóisialach"
Back to School Clothing and Footwear Allowance
Liúntas Éadaí agus Coisbhirt chun Filleadh ar Scoil
